text: Krassimir Balakov (born 29 March 1966) is a former Bulgarian football player. He has played for Bulgaria national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club career statistics=== |- |1990–91||rowspan="5"|Sporting Portugal||rowspan="5"|Portuguese Liga||18||4 |- |1991–92||32||7 |- |1992–93||32||11 |- |1993–94||29||15 |- |1994–95||27||6 |- |1995–96||rowspan="8"|Stuttgart||rowspan="8"|Bundesliga||34||7 |- |1996–97||31||13 |- |1997–98||31||11 |- |1998–99||24||5 |- |1999–2000||30||6 |- |2000–01||28||6 |- |2001–02||30||4 |- |2002–03||28||2 |- |2005–06||Plauen||Oberliga||1||0 138||43 237||54 375||97 |} ===International career statistics=== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Bulgaria's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Balakov goal.
